home.p: Welcome to the oficial website of LhyonZ Twitch channel, this is a channel where you can find streams of videogames in the afternoons, normally of one hour of duration, with Gameplaysof games like Genshin Impact, PUBG movile, Pokemon Unite, Ark: Survival Evolved, Minecraft, Toram Online, Heart Stone, Life After, etc... everyone of them high recomended and available to download in Android Play Store.

In this page you can know a litle more about the channel, things likecommands for the chatBot, items available in the StreamLabs Store, info about the apps that you see during the stream as ads, all of them are tools offer by the channel to have a nice time.

commands.p: During the streams in the chat window you can find a chatBot that responds to some commands, with these commands you can access to special features of the channel, these commands are:

/color with this command you can personalize the color in wich your nickname appear in the chat window, you select one of the following colors:
Coral, DodgerBlue, SpringGreen, Green, OrangeRed, Red, GoldenRod, HotPink, CadetBlue, SeaGreen, Chocolate, BlueViolet, FireBrick, and Blue.
example of use: /color blue

/me With this command your message will appear in the same color than your nickname's color, the color you previous set with the command /color. this command helps you to highlight your message.
example of use: /me "I have that pokemon too."

/w With this command you can send private messajes to other twitch users including the streamer.
example: /w lhyonz hello lhyon how are you?

!cita This command shows a random quote, these quotes are random and can be funny or inspirational.
example of use: !quote

!sensey Do you need an advice, ask to our sensey, this command permits to ask a question to our sensey he will give you an advice.
example of use: !sensey should I give bits to the Streamer? XD

store.p: Streams labs permits us to have a store in the channel in this store you can find special items that you can adquire with Bitz the coin of the channel, you can adquire Bitz automatically viewing the stream.
you can adquire the items of the store with the command !Comprar, some of these items are:

!comprar jugar With this item you can be part of the game session (if the game permits), this item has a cost of 190.00 Bitz.
example of use: !comprar jugar myPUBG_ID_or_nick

!comprar juego With this item, you can select a new game for the stream, you need to ask to the streamer if he can play the game in his mobile device, this item has a cost of 75.00 Bitz.
example of use: !comprar juego Pokemon Unite

!comprar palabra With this command you can select a word and that word will be banned during the rest of the stream, this command has a cost of 100.00 Bitz.
example of use: !comprar palabra myFavroryteWord

!comprar link With this command you can send a link to your Twitch Channel or social network (Facebook, Youtube, Discord), this command has a cost of 30.00 Bitz, after of buy this item you have 30 secconds to send your link through the chat window.
example of use: !comprar link

!comprar noTexto if you adquire this item, during the next minute nobody else can send text messages, the comunication can only be made with emotes, this item has a cost of 30.00 Bitz.
example of use: !comprar noTexto

!duracion With this command you can know how much time has the channel on live, this item has a cost of 10.00 Bitz.
example of use: !duracion

!billetera With this command you can kmow how much Bitz do you have on your wallet, this item has a cost of 10.00 Bitz.
example of use: !billetera

!desde With this command you can know the date since you are following us, this item has a cost of 10.00 Bitz.
example of use: !desde

!horas With this command you can know how many hours you have accumulated viewing our streams.
example of use: !horas
